mr-1-en.text: I had no idea Japanese horror movies were so scary

mr-3-en.text: This goes straight to the podium with the best sports movies.

mr-4-en.text: Of all the films to have zombies in, why THIS ONE?

mr-5-en.text: Pure adrenaline from start to finish!

mr-6-en.text: The scene with two actual twin actors is the only decent part of the movie.
